# Git Commit Guide

## Commit Message Format

This project uses conventional commit messages:

- `feat:` - New feature
- `fix:` - Bug fix
- `docs:` - Documentation changes
- `refactor:` - Code refactoring
- `test:` - Test changes
- `chore:` - Maintenance tasks

## Example Commits

```
feat: implement feed parser service for RSS/Atom feeds
fix: resolve Confluence API authentication issue
docs: update README with global page instructions
refactor: improve error handling in news processor
test: add unit tests for keyword filtering
chore: update dependencies
```
